page.title: 19THE SHOPPING CENTRE
page.content: Newton Abbot supplies most people fairly sufficently but as we can see there are too many{estate agents, {jewellers,drug stores/chemists}and {shoe shops}that are not needed.A variety of clothes shops(for men especially)and department stores would take the place of those other unwanted shops.This town has an{indoor market which is held on{Wednesdays}and {Saturdays.}The{outdoor market}has stalls that sell clothes,jewellry,pet food,cards and there are a few permanent stalls as well.In the indoor market there is a{dairy}part which sells eggs,cheese and milk and there is also a{bakery,}a{butchers,}a{health {food counter}and a{sweet counter.}In the next part of the indoor market it sells mainly fruit and vegetables.On the other stalls there is a mixture of other things such as books,brass etc.
